message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
